description: Rules for conducting self-audits of code, documentation, and environment
content:
# Self-Audit Rules

## Code Audit
- Review code quality
- Check for vulnerabilities
- Verify test coverage
- Validate documentation
- Update security status

## Documentation Audit
- Check file completeness
- Verify cross-references
- Validate formats
- Update timestamps
- Review security docs

## State Audit
- Verify task status
- Check progress tracking
- Validate decisions
- Review questions
- Confirm security status

## Environment Audit
- Verify tool versions
- Check dependencies
- Validate configurations
- Test security tools
- Confirm compatibility
